item.description:
new edit: this film just won NBR's best film, ensemble+adapted screenplay of the 2007 award:
http://www.darkhorizo...

Runtime: 2 hr. 2 min. | R strong graphic violence and some language

^emphasis on the violence part.

Cast: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson, Kelly MacDonald

Director: Ethan Coen

Genres: Crime Thriller, Thriller

Description: Llewelyn Moss finds a pickup truck surrounded by a sentry of dead men. A load of heroin and two million dollars in cash are still in the back trunk. When Moss takes the money, he sets off a chain reaction of catastrophic violence that not even the law ? namely aging, disillusioned Sheriff Bell ? can contain. Moss tries to evade his pursuers, in particular a mysterious mastermind who flips coins for human lives, as the crime drama broadens.

Review: http://www.boston.com...

Trailer: http://www.apple.com/...

Notes: Please do not RSVP YES if you do not intend to come. Yes is not a MAYBE. If you can't figure out what your going to do in the future, please do not burden us with that. Please buy your tix AHEAD of time! I'm going to watch this regardless of people coming, but it will more fun with people.

The movie is playing downstairs in auditorium#1. I'll be waiting after your ticket stubs are ripped. Near the conession stands.

I'll be there by 7:10PM. We plan to go into the cinema @precisely 7:30PM. The film starts @7:40PM.

I"ll be wearing my trademark green hat+Meetup logo+my screename JediFonger in front as usual.

After the film ends, I'll be waiting right in front of the big screen near the exits w/my green hat+Meetup logo+my screename JediFonger. The group often goes out afterwards and socialize.
item.name: No Country for Old Men
